metadata.title: CVE-2021-24032 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Beginning in v1.4.1 and prior to v1.4.9, due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2021-24031, the Zstandard command-line utility created output fileswith default permissions and restricted those permissions immediatelyafterwards. Output files could therefore momentarily be readable orwritable to unintended parties.

criterions.comment: libzstd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
